document.full_text: a man convicted of murdering four people in mobile county in 1992 is scheduled to be executed by lethal injection on thursday evening, the first inmate to be put to death in alabama using pentobarbital.
document.title: alabama set to execute man who killed four in 1992
lines_and_colors: a man convicted of murdering four people in mobile county in 1992 is scheduled to be executed by lethal injection on thursday evening, the first inmate to be put to death in alabama using pentobarbital.
